Class.name: Report.INTFRLine
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INTFRLine.Company as INTFRLine_Company,SQLUser.INTFR.Company as INTFR_Company,SQLUser.INPARA.Company as INPARA_Company,SQLUser.INTFRLine.TransferNumber,SQLUser.INTFRLine.TransferLineNumber,SQLUser.INTFRLine.Item,SQLUser.INTFRLine.ItemGroup,SQLUser.INTFRLine.Quantity,SQLUser.INTFRLine.Unit,SQLUser.INTFRLine.ReceivedQuantity,SQLUser.WWW101.ParameterDescription,SQLUser.WWW101.Language1,SQLUser.WWW101.SearchItem,SQLUser.WWW101.Text as ItemUOM,SQLUser.INTFRLine.QOHFromLocation,SQLUser.INTFRLine.ItemName,SQLUser.INTFR.TransferNumber as TransferNumberHeader,SQLUser.INTFR.SendingLocation as Source,SQLUser.INTFR.ReceivingLocation as Destination,SQLUser.INTFR.Status,SQLUser.INPARA.ParameterName,SQLUser.INPARA.Language1 as Language2,SQLUser.INPARA.SearchWord,SQLUser.INPARA.Text as ItemGroupDesc,SQLUser.INTFRLine.AverageConsumption,SQLUser.INTFR.TransferDate,SQLUser.INTFRLine.PickedQuantity,SQLUser.INTFR.SendingLocnName as SendingLocationName,SQLUser.INTFR.ReceivingLocnName as ReceivingLocationName,SQLUser.INTFR.ReceiptNumber,SQLUser.INTFR.Received from SQLUser.INTFRLine,SQLUser.WWW101,SQLUser.INTFR,SQLUser.INPARA where (WWW101.ParameterDescription = 'EINHEIT') and (WWW101.SearchItem = INTFRLine.Unit) and (INTFR.TransferNumber = INTFRLine.TransferNumber) and (INPARA.ParameterName = 'WARENGRUPPE') and (INPARA.SearchWord = INTFRLine.ItemGroup) and (INTFR.Company = INTFRLine.Company)
